title: Merge index.html and workspace-v3.html functionality
fix_description: Merged landing page (index.html) and workspace dashboard (workspace-v3.html) into a single unified page. Landing section appears at top for non-logged-in users. Features section (#features) contains full workspace dashboard for logged-in users. Login automatically takes users to #features section.

fix_details.problem: Two separate pages needed to be merged without overlapping functionality
fix_details.solution: Created unified index.html with two sections: #landing (public) and #features (workspace for logged-in users). JavaScript logic handles showing/hiding sections based on login state.

landing_section: Clean landing page for new visitors
features_section: 6 action cards (ARAYA download, bug reporting, live monitor, GitHub, chat, back home)

fix_details.behavior: Logged-out users see landing page. Logged-in users automatically see features section. Login redirects to index.html#features.
